title: FTP and EternalBlue Compromise
description: Exploit FTP misconfigurations and EternalBlue vulnerability across separate machines.
hints: Check if the FTP server allows anonymous access.
Use Metasploit's EternalBlue module against the vulnerable machine.
Sensitive information on FTP might aid your EternalBlue exploit.
learningObjectives: Understand FTP misconfigurations and their exploitation.
Learn how to leverage EternalBlue vulnerability.
Practice network scanning and service exploitation techniques.
